ARABIC: قَالُوا۟ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِمَّآ أَن تُلْقِىَ وَإِمَّآ أَن نَّكُونَ أَوَّلَ مَنْ أَلْقَىٰ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They said, 'Musa, will you throw or shall we be the first to throw?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They said: "Either you cast (your spell), O Moses, or we shall cast it first."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: The magicians said: "Moses, will you throw down or shall we be the first to throw?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They said, "Moses, would you be the first to show your skill or should we be the first to throw down our devices?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They said, “O Moosa, either you throw first – or shall we throw first?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They said: "O Musa! Either you throw first or we be the first to throw"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They said: O Musa! will you cast, or shall we be the first who cast down?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They said, 'Moses, either thou wilt cast, or we shall be the first to cast.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They said: O Moses! Either throw first, or let us be the first to throw?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They said, "Moses, will you throw down first, or shall we be the first to throw down?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They said: either thou cast down, or we shall be the first to cast down.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They said, ‘O Moses! Will you throw first, or shall we?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They said: "O Moses! whether wilt thou that thou throw (first) or that we be the first to throw?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They said:"O Musa (Moses)! Either you throw first or we be the first to throw?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They said to Moses: 'Will you throw down or shall we be the first?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They said, “O Moses, either you throw, or we will be the first to throw.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They said, "O Moses, either you throw or we will be the first to throw."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:65] They said, ‘O Moses, you choose: either cast, your staff first, or we shall be the first to cast’, their staff.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They said) the magicians said to Moses: (0 Moses! Either throw first) either you throw your staff to the ground first, (or let us be the first to throw?)
